column4: Hello again. I have checked under the advanced window settings, and the basic window settings. However, I see no way to make my windows transparent (so I can see throught one to the other.). Does anyone have any suggestions as to where I might look. please?
How do I check? (I have the sproingy windows, is that a compiz setting?)
I think so - it that the one with all the buttons like 'desktop cube' and 'fire effect'?
